articles.title: Do you want to be a K-pop star? Blackpink's agency YG Entertainment is holding auditions in Singapore - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Applications are open to those born between 2003 and 2012 and you can only pick one category in which to show off your skills: Vocal, rap or dance.
articles.content:
Heres your shot at becoming one of the next big names in K-pop. YG Entertainment, the agency behind superstars Blackpink, is holding auditions in Singapore as part of its global talent search.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets inch lower as investors weigh Fed hike - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific shares slipped slightly on Friday as investors continue to weigh the Federal Reserve's aggressive stance.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Rupee hits record low as Asian peers tumble on Fed rate view - Economic Times
articles.description: The rupee closed at a record low of 80.86 to the dollar, down from 79.9750 in the previous session.
articles.content:
The Indian rupee dropped to a record low versus the U.S. dollar on Thursday, as Asian currencies declined on concerns over the pace and quantum of U.S. Federal Reserve's policy tightening ahead.
